item.title: Freenom free domains is it worth it ?
item.author: Author
item.description: When it comes to building a new website, the question of the domain name comes generally quickly. Actually, that’s quite obvious because if you don’t have a domain name nobody will never find your website (except those bots willing to hack into your server). A bit of background As you might already know, plenty of domain names extensions do exist. We can sort them into two non-exhaustive lists :
